name: GHOSTkit
body:
### Welcome to the Geospace/Heliosphere Observation & Simulation Tool-kit
GHOSTkit is a tool-kit plugin for the @kitware ParaView project and is open source.  We are currently developing the basic functionality necessary to perform space weather science and forecasting tasks.  As more tools are written, their descriptions will be available here.

We are currently working on a preliminary build for release as a binary.  These binary files will be available on this page when they are ready.

### Current Status
- [x] LFM Reader
- [x] ENLIL Reader
- [x] CDAweb Toolkit
- [ ] Coordinate Transform Utility
- [ ] Space Craft Positions
- [ ] Closed Field Line filter

### Getting the Code
The code is available in its entirety from github.  You can get the code with the following commands:
```
git clone git://github.com/ghost-kit/GHOST.git
```

As soon as it is ready, you will be able to a master build, including all required dependencies, by issuing the command (on UNIX type systems):
```
mkdir ghost-build
cd ghost-build
cmake ../GHOST -DENABLE_ghost
make
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
